topic.title: Now Available: Foreign Relations of the United States, 1981–1988, Volume XI, START I
topic.body: This volume is the first of two volumes devoted to the START I agreement with the Soviet Union to reduce and limit strategic offensive arms. This volume documents the negotations and internal U.S. deliberations during the Reagan administration.
topic.image-description: Book Cover of Foreign Relations of the United States, 1981–1988, Volume XI, START I
topic.image-source-information: Created by the Office of the Historian
